title: Encompass LOS Pipeline Dashboard Screenshot
description: Screenshot of the Encompass loan pipeline dashboard showing active loans, status distribution, and aging metrics as of 2025-10-14. Captured during system walkthrough with IT administrator.
redaction_notes: Borrower names and SSN columns masked in screenshot
annotations: Pipeline shows 142 active loans across all stages
12 loans flagged red for age > 45 days
Missing consumer direct channel filter - only Retail/Wholesale visible
